name: Ninja Nights
description:
Ninja Nights is a parkour platformer developed by Lorion Oshin and Will Montgomery for the ScoreSpace Game Jam.

Find all the bad guys to win each level.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys =  Move and control jump direction when grabbing
    • Hold Arrow Left or right - Sprint (Run up walls while sprinting)
  • Z = Roll/Flip
  • Space = Jump 
    • Space + Directional while near a wall to push off
  • Auto Grab Ledges and Blocks :
    • UP and JUMP to jump up,
      • Directional + Jump to Leap off left or right
        • Down + Jump: Dropdown
